mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT darm.* FROM data_market_resource_apply dmra INNER JOIN data_assets_resource_mount darm ON dmra.resource_mount_id=darm.id WHERE darm.mount_type=1 AND dmra.deleted=0 AND dmra.resource_id=#{id} AND dmra.apply_user_id=#{userId} AND apply_start_time<=now() AND apply_end_time>=now() AND dmra.status=1 AND dmra.if_auth=1
